title:
NVIDIA Knocks off Saudi Aramco to Become World's 3rd-largest ListedCo. in 
Mkt Cap
text: NVIDIA (NVDA.US)       knocked off Saudi Aramco to become the world's third-largest listed company in terms of market capitalization, only trailing behind Microsoft (MSFT.US)       and Apple (AAPL.US)      .According to data from Companies Market Cap., NVIDIA closed yesterday (4th) up 3.6% at US$852.37, with a market cap of US$2.13 trillion, which is higher than Saudi Aramco's US$2.02 trillion. The market caps of Microsoft and Apple are US$3.08 trillion and US$2.7 trillion respectively.Related News3 Key US Stock Indexes End Lower as Wall St. Upswing Remains StalledBased on the closing price of US$495.22 at the end of last year, NVIDIA has grossed surges of 72% YTD.(Real-time Streaming US Stocks Quote; Except All OTC quotes are at least 15 minutes delayed.)AAStocks Financial News
